content.text: Roxanne was a Baratie customer with whom Sanji spoke. She appeared only in the manga.
She can be barely seen, but she is a young woman. She wears a skirt and blouse.
Nothing is known about her personality, but she apparently enjoys eating at the Baratie since Sanji knows her by name.
She was seen returning with a friend to the Baratie where Sanji greeted her by name and started flirting.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Manga — Vol. 6 Chapter 46, Roxanne's First Appearance.
↑  Vivre Card - One Piece Visual Dictionary, Roxanne's birthday is given.
